posts.post_content:
Hi. I am interested in the following T206s with Polar Bear backs graded SGC 40-60 only. No PSA or raw please: F. Delehanty, Schirm, Dorner, J. Collins, Lavender, Mclean, Merkle (throwing), Kleinow (catching), Snodgrass (catching), Warhop, Herzog (Boston), Meyers (portrait), Doolan (batting), H. Davis (H on front), Taylor, McQuillan (throwing) & Doc White (pitching). Please send scans and prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url] Thanks!
PS - I would also be interested in an AB/EPDG/OM/Tolstoi any player graded SGC 40 or better for around $100 Let me know what you have, I am picky about which players (based on artwork only or White Sox)

Hey Tony,

H. Davis (H. on front) and McQuillan (Ball in Hand) are 150/350 subjects that are not possible with Polar Bear.  You can stop looking for those.  Best of luck with the rest.

Scot

Thanks Scot, I read the chart incorrectly.
Best, Tony
